titles.title: UAC State Notification Act of 2014
A bill to require notification of a Governor of a State if an unaccompanied alien child is transferred to the State and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/14/2014--Introduced. UAC State Notification Act of 2014 - Amends the William Wilberforce Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act of 2008 to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security (DHS) or the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to notify the governor of a state within 48 hours before transferring to the state an unaccompanied alien child in the Secretary's custody.
